text: “apa gē paramādhipatiyāṇani! tava da oba gē væki ovuna ṭa pārāyanaya kara pen vana, dēva granthaya hā pragnā va ovuna ṭa ugan vana, ovun va pivituru karana, ovungen ma vū dharma dūtayeku ovun atara ṭa evanu mænava! sæbævin ma sarva baladhārī mahā pragnāvanta vannē obama ya.” (yanuven ibrāhīm nabi tumā prārthanā kaḷaha)
